name: Enduring-Embers
title: Enduring Embers
author: Darkstorm2150
description: Enduring Embers is a Factorio mod crafted to elevate your visual experience, transforming the humble smoke trail into a profound, lasting aspect of your industrial journey. Say goodbye to fleeting, grey wisps and hello to rich, black smoke that lingers, immersing you deeper into your factory's bustling life.
